sentence.Network_en: Is there any corroborative evidence for this theory?

sentence.Network_en: They convicted the wrong man on the basis of a signed confession with no corroborative evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 凭一张有签名的认罪书而没有确凿的佐证,他们就错误地判了那人有罪.
